name: Chicken & Tomato Sauce
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the chicken, stirring occasionally, until lightly coloured.
2. Add the onion, celery, and carrots, and cook for 5 minutes until softened.
3. Add the oregano, wine and tomatoes.
4. Bring to the boil, cover, then reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
6. Garnish with oregano and serve with parmesan shavings.
